h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
content: The pillar stance heavy attack is quite slow, but does big AOE damage and can knock enemies flying off ledges.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Things_Black_Myth_Wukong_Doesn't_Tell_You.md', within the main section titled 'Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection '11\. Heavy Attacks Work Differently'.
The content is as follows:
The pillar stance heavy attack is quite slow, but does big AOE damage and can knock enemies flying off ledges.
